carousel.item.one.title: Software Solutions
carousel.item.one.description: We offer efficient technology solutions, making use of the good practices required by the development of the current market.
carousel.item.two.title: Resource Optimization
carousel.item.two.description: It is in our philosophy to design, develop and implement solutions that optimize your company's software and hardware resources.
carousel.item.three.title: Custom design
carousel.item.three.description: We understand that the needs of our customers are different, so it is important to analyze and design solutions that meet the requirements.

us.title: Us
us.description: We are a company that was born to give quick and efficient solutions to your business. We also implement the best design and development techniques. Optimization is a fundamental principle, which is why all our products and solutions are tailor-made, guaranteeing optimal use of available resources.

team.title: Work team.
team.description: Our work team is responsible for Analyzing, Designing and Implementing the technology solutions required by our clients.

item.one.title: Development Methodologies
item.one.description: We implement the agile development methodology SCRUM in our engineering and design projects; guaranteeing to deliver a product that generates value to your company and optimize your response times and improve the quality of your business.

item.two.title: Development tools
item.two.description: We make use of the best Development tools that currently exist, this facilitates the construction of the solutions. We use IDE's as they are:

item.three.title: Technologies
item.three.description: We design and build solutions with current market technologies. We use Java , C # , JavaScript and TypeScript development languages. We handle technologies in MySQL , Oracle , PostgreSQL and Mongo DB databases.

optimization.title: Optimization
optimization.description: Our technological products not only meet the client's requirements, in addition to this, the functionalities are optimized, which allows a better performance in the daily tasks performed with the solution implemented.

design.title: Custom design.
design.description: Our products comply with the Analysis and Design phase, which allows us to deliver to our clients functional quality prototypes prior to the delivery of the final solution.

item.one.title: Product Analysis
item.one.description: We analyze the problems of our customers to understand their needs and determine the product that best fits to contribute to the solution. We determine the functional and non-functional requirements of the solution.

item.two.title: Solution Design
item.two.description: We build the architecture of the solution prioritizing the optimization of the different processes that the product will perform. The use of the latest technologies are contemplated in the design of the final solution.

why.us.title: Why choose us?
why.us.description: We are new to the market and we seek to generate changes in the software industry, through solutions that contribute to a healthy development of society.
why.us.top.one.title: OPTIMIZATION
why.us.top.one.description: All the processes that are generated in our technology solutions optimize resources.
why.us.top.two.title: SCALABILITY
why.us.top.two.description: Our products and solutions are open to constant updates, without affecting quality.
why.us.top.three.title: USER EXPERIENCE
why.us.top.three.description: Our products improve the user experience by making application management simpler.

term.conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
term.conditions.content:
Updated: May 05, 2020

RELEVANT INFORMATION

It is a necessary requirement for the acquisition of the products offered on this site, that you read and Accept the following Terms and Conditions that are written below. The use of our services as well as the purchase of our products will imply that you have read and accepted the Terms and Conditions of Use in this document. All products   that are offered through our website could be created, charged, sent or submitted by a web page third and in that case they would be subject to their own Terms and Conditions. In some cases, for acquiring a product, registration by the user will be necessary, with data entry Reliable personnel and definition of a password.

The user can choose and change the password for their account administration access in any time, in case you have registered and that is necessary for the purchase of any of our products. AcquaBoard does not assume responsibility in case deliver this key to third parties.

All purchases and transactions carried out through this website are subject to a confirmation and verification process, which could include stock verification and product availability, payment method validation, invoice validation (in case of exist) and compliance with the conditions required by the selected payment method. In Some cases may require verification by email.

The prices of the products offered in this Online Store is valid only in purchases made on this website.

LICENSE

AcquaBoard   Through its website it grants a license for users to use   the products that are sold on this website according to the Terms and Conditions that are described in this document.

UNAUTHORIZED USE

If applicable (for software, temple sales, or other design product and programming) you cannot place one of our products, modified or unmodified, in a CD, website or any other means and offer them for redistribution or resale of any type.

PROPERTY

You cannot declare intellectual or exclusive property to any of our products, modified or unmodified. All products are property of the suppliers of the content. In case you do not specify otherwise, our products are provided   without any warranty, express or implied. In no way will this company be responsible for no damage including, but not limited to, direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential damages consequential or other losses resulting from the use or inability to use our products.

REFUND AND GUARANTEE POLICY

In the case of products that are   irrevocable non-tangible goods, we do not perform Refunds after the product is shipped, you have the responsibility to understand before buy.   We ask that you read carefully before buying it. We only make exceptions with this rule when the description does not fit the product. There are some products that could have guarantee and possibility of refund but this will be specified when buying the product. In such cases the warranty will only cover factory faults and will only become effective when the product is have used correctly. The warranty does not cover breakdowns or damage caused by misuse. The warranty terms are associated with manufacturing and operation failures in conditions normal of the products and these terms will only become effective if the equipment has been used correctly. This includes:

– According to the technical specifications indicated for each product.
- Under conditions environmental standards according to the specifications indicated by the manufacturer.
- In specific use for the function with which it was designed at the factory.
- Under electrical operating conditions in accordance with the specifications and tolerances indicated.

ANTI-FRAUD CHECK

The customer's purchase can be postponed for the anti-fraud check. Can also be suspended for longer for more rigorous investigation, to avoid transactions fraudulent

PRIVACY

This web site guarantees that personal information that you send has the necessary security. The data entered by user or in the case of requiring a validation of the Orders will not be delivered to third parties, unless it must be disclosed in compliance with an order judicial or legal requirements.

Subscription to advertising email newsletters is voluntary and could be selected at the time of creating your account.

AcquaBoard reserves the right to change or modify these terms without prior notice.

polity-privacy.title: Privacy Policy
polity-privacy.content:
Updated: May 05, 2020

This Privacy Policy establishes the terms in which AcquaBoard uses and protects the information that is provided by its users when using its website. This company It is committed to the security of its users' data. When we ask you to fill in the fields of personal information with which you can be identified, we do it by ensuring that you only will use in accordance with the terms of this document. However this Privacy Policy It may change over time or be updated so we recommend and emphasize review continuously this page to make sure you agree with those changes.

Information that is collected

Our website may collect personal information such as: Name,   information of contact as   Your email address and demographic information. Likewise when if necessary, specific information may be required to process an order or make a delivery or billing.

Use of the information collected

Our website uses the information in order to provide the best possible service, particularly to keep a record of users, of orders if applicable, and to improve Our products and services. & nbsp; Emails may be sent periodically through our site with special offers, new products and other information advertising that we consider relevant to you or that can provide you with some benefit, these Emails will be sent to the address you provide and may be canceled at any moment.

AcquaBoard is highly committed to fulfill the commitment to maintain its secure information. We use the most advanced systems and constantly update them to make sure there is no unauthorized access.

Cookies

A cookie refers to a file that is sent for the purpose of requesting permission to be stored on your computer, accepting that file is created and the cookie is then used to have information regarding web traffic, and also facilitates future visits to a recurring website. Another function that cookies have is that with them the websites can recognize you individually and therefore provide you with the best personalized service on your website.

Our website uses cookies to identify the pages that are visited and their frequency. This information is used only for statistical analysis and then the Information is permanently deleted. You can delete cookies at any time from your computer. However cookies help to provide a better service of the sites web, you are not giving access to information from your computer or from you, unless you do so want and provide it directly, visits to a web . You can accept or deny the use of cookies, however most of Browsers accept cookies automatically as it serves to have a better web service. As well You can change your computer settings to decline cookies. If they decline it is You may not be able to use some of our services.

Third Party Links

This website may contain links to other sites that may be of interest to you. Once you click on these links and leave our page, we no longer have control over the site at which is redirected and therefore we are not responsible for the terms or privacy or the protection of your data on those other third party sites. These sites are subject to their own privacy policies so it is advisable to consult them to confirm that you are Agree with these.

Control of your personal information

At any time you may restrict the collection or use of personal information that is provided to our website.   Each time you are asked to fill out a form, such as the user registration, you can check or uncheck the option to receive information by mail electronic.   In case you have marked the option to receive our newsletter or advertising You can cancel it at any time.

This company will not sell, assign or distribute personal information that is collected without your consent, unless required by a judge with a court order.

AcquaBoard reserves the right to change the terms of this Privacy Policy anytime.
